AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.subtitle: Find out more about my history, my passions and what motivates me every day to create innovative digital solutions
AboutSection.p1: I am a 20-year-old student with a strong passion for computer science and programming, especially in web and application development. After attending a Technical Institute for IT, I chose to further specialize by enrolling in an ITS program as a Fullstack Developer, a path I am pursuing alongside my university studies.
AboutSection.p2: In recent years, I have dedicated myself to creating personal and educational projects, experimenting with new technologies and strengthening my skills. I love challenging myself, learning by doing, and growing through interaction with industry professionals and experts.
AboutSection.p3: My motivation is simple: to transform curiosity and the desire to learn into solid practical skills.

ContactSection.title: Get in touch
ContactSection.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? Let's talk about it! I'm always interested in new challenges and opportunities for collaboration.
